channel.title: Love, Life and Everything in Betweeen
channel.description: A blog by Debby Jane Azarcon-Difuntorum.

item.title: The start of a new beginning
item.description:
Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It does not dishonor others, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.

Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will cease; where there are tongues, they will be stilled; where there is knowledge, it will pass away.

May 23, 2016

The day I said I do to the the man who fixed me. :)

How it started:

No we did not started as friends. Rather, we started as colleagues. Looking back, itâ€™s amazing how love can come to people at times you least expect it.

I was in a process of getting over someone when we met. He on the other hand has been in haitus for years when it comes to having a relationship with someone. He waited around a year before I finally took my chance with him. :)

Fast forward:

We were part of the LDR population. It was actually a gift because it was through it, we realized how much we wanted to be together.

To the near future:

Yes, you are uncertain. But I know, whatever you will throw at us, we can overcome it with God and with our love.

To my husband:

I love you with all my heart. Thank you for fixing my heart.
